derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, formed irregularly from penta- 'five' + Greek stēmōn 'warp', used to mean 'stamen'

means.word_mean: 1. large genus of subshrubs or herbs having showy blue or purple or red or yellow or white flowers; mostly western North America
